[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [IConsoleTerminalProviderOptions](./node-core-library.iconsoleterminalprovideroptions.md) &gt; [debugEnabled](./node-core-library.iconsoleterminalprovideroptions.debugenabled.md)

## IConsoleTerminalProviderOptions.debugEnabled property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If true, print debug logging messages. Note that "verbose" and "debug" are considered separate message filters; if you want debug to imply verbose, it is up to your application code to enforce that.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
debugEnabled: boolean;
```
